headline: How to play consumer staples: PepsiCo, Procter & Gamble
summary: Consumer sentiment is under pressure as worries over inflation persist. Washington Crossing Advisors senior portfolio manager Chad Morganlander sits down with Josh Lipton on Market Domination to discuss how to play the consumer staples (XLP) sector, taking a closer look at names like PepsiCo (PEP) and Procter & Gamble (PG). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Half of companies increasing prices in response to tariffs
summary: A new survey has found that 39% of companies are already increasing prices and that a further 10% intend to do so.
